name: Storage Mounts
description: Ensures all Proxmox storage mounts defined in /etc/fstab are available and mounted.
check_cmd: if [ -f /etc/fstab ]; then MISSING=$(grep -vE 'cgroup|proc|sysfs|tmpfs' /etc/fstab | awk '{print $2}' | while read m; do mountpoint -q "$m" || echo "$m"; done); if [ -z "$MISSING" ]; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if [ -f /etc/fstab ]; then for m in $(grep -vE 'cgroup|proc|sysfs|tmpfs' /etc/fstab | awk '{print $2}'); do mount "$m" 2>/dev/null || true; done; fi
verify_cmd: MISSING=$(grep -vE 'cgroup|proc|sysfs|tmpfs' /etc/fstab | awk '{print $2}' | while read m; do mountpoint -q "$m" || echo "$m"; done); if [ -z "$MISSING" ]; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
